bwwExcerpt: This is a funny show. Puns aplenty come flying at you like popcorn kernels, and the maize malapropisms will have you all ears (clearly they’re much better at it than we are). If one joke doesn’t land with you, just wait a few seconds for the next ribald ribbing or one-liner — delivered with the same assured rhythm, like some sort of countrified 1930s screwball comedy.
